00030   return $dimentions[1];

00052   return $dimentions[1];

00072   if($this->file === false)
00073    return false;
00074    
00075   getimagesize($this->file, $extrainfo);
00076   return $extrainfo;
00077  }

00086  public function getImageType() {
00087   if($this->file === false)
00088    return false;
00089    
00090   $ext = strtoupper(substr($this->file, strrpos($this->file, '.') + 1));
00091   
00092   // normalise shorter extensions
00093   if($ext == "JPG")
00094    return "JPEG";
00095    
00096   return $ext;
00097  }
00098

00106   return array('.gif', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png');
00107  }
